column2: how could I now just be discovering this place in the Galleria area? I came here for an early HH with a business guest on Friday. (Their happy hour specials start at 3:00p and go until 6:00p on week days.) They have an excellent local and Texas beer selection
column4: though we didn't try any this day. The happy hour bites are simply delicious. The short rib grilled cheese and tuna wrap are total steals at $6 and $5
column6: to be shared easily among two. The HH drink prices are competitive but not as good of a deal as the food. Highly recommended...
